name: TheCrunch
description:
You are an intern in a ruthless corporation. Perform tasks and rise in the ranks.

HOW TO PLAY: To perform the task, click on it as it appears on the right panel. Make sure to enter fields correctly or you will receive a strike. After 3 strikes an error will result in failure and penalty to your performance rating. The same will happen if you fail to meet the deadline.

Made by:

Me - game and visuals

Andrei Olinic - music
